meta-runner.name: Upload artifacts to DMS
meta-runner.description: Depends on following TeamCity parameters: * DMS_STANDARD_PARAMETERS * DMS_EXTRA_PARAMETERS * DMS_JVM_OPTS * DMS_JDK_VERSION * DMS_MAVEN_VERSION * env.BUILD_ENV

param.name: COMPONENT_NAME
param.spec: text description='Name of Component registered in Component Registry' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: BUILD_VERSION
param.spec: text description='Component version registered in JIRA' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACT_TYPE
param.spec: select description='Artifact type' data_1='distribution' data_2='notes' data_3='report' data_4='static' data_5='documentation' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTS_COORDINATES
param.spec: text description='Maven artifacts coordinates (without version)' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTS_COORDINATES_VERSION
param.spec: text description='Maven artifacts coordinates version (if it differs from BUILD_VERSION)' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTS_COORDINATES_DEB
param.spec: text description='DEB packages coordinates' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTS_COORDINATES_RPM
param.spec: text description='RPM packages coordinates' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTS_COORDINATES_DOCKER
param.spec: text description='Docker images coordinates' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: DMS_PUBLISH_VALIDATION_LOG_FILE
param.spec: text description='Path to dms log file' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'
